Text:
Forgot instructions on how to install, use... :P

Included is an ISO file.
Just mount it using Daemon tools, or a similar program.
Or you can burn it to a CD and use it that way.

The CD must be in the drive, or the ISO must be mounted for access to the information.

Thanks! Every manufacturer should be required by law to provide their Service Manuals to the public at no cost. Consumers should not have to decide between the cost-benefit of paying someone to repair against buying a new model. Efficiency, our planet and our progeny deserve better conservation methodologies.
